description:
Space Ranger is a set of analysis pipelines that process Visium data
with brightfield and fluorescence microscope images. Space Ranger allows
users to map the whole transcriptome in formalin fixed paraffin embedded
(FFPE) and fresh frozen (FF) tissues. This package requires the user to
accept a license and to download the tarball manually. Once downloaded,
the file should be placed within a manual mirror or within the current
directory. For instructions on making a manual mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
name: spaceranger

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
